hero.title: <span class='accent'>Unlock  Your <span class='keyword'>Child's  Math Potential
hero.description: Engaging, <span class='emphasize'>expert-led  online math programs for kids from <span class='grade'>Grade 1 to Grade 12 .

expertTutors.title: <span class='emphasize'>Expert Tutors
expertTutors.description: All our instructors are <span class='accent'>math experts  with <span class='keyword'>years of experience .

interactiveClasses.title: <span class='emphasize'>Interactive Classes
interactiveClasses.description: Fun, <span class='accent'>engaging sessions  that keep kids <span class='keyword'>excited about learning .

flexibleScheduling.title: <span class='emphasize'>Flexible Scheduling
flexibleScheduling.description: <span class='accent'>Weekend  and <span class='accent'>evening classes  available to fit your <span class='keyword'>schedule .

personalizedLearning.title: <span class='emphasize'>Personalized Learning
personalizedLearning.description: Courses designed to meet each student’s <span class='accent'>unique needs  and <span class='keyword'>learning style .

items.title: Mini Solvers (Class 1–2)
items.description: Foundations in addition, subtraction, and number sense.

items.title: Young Explorers (Class 3–4)
items.description: Explore problem solving through puzzles and early Olympiad topics.

items.title: Trailblazers (Class 5)
items.description: Strengthen logic and dive into NMTC and SOF preparation.

items.title: Math Builders (Class 6)
items.description: Hands-on training for Olympiad Level 1 and NMTC Primary category.

items.title: Math Challengers (Class 7)
items.description: Tackling complex problems, AMC 8 and Olympiad Level 2 topics.

items.title: AMC Jumpers (Class 8)
items.description: Advance toward AMC 10 and strengthen NMTC and ISI fundamentals.

items.title: JEE/ISI Starters (Class 9)
items.description: Develop algebraic problem-solving skills and exam strategies.

items.title: Board + Math Wiz (Class 10)
items.description: Master board math while preparing for JEE Main and Olympiads.

items.title: JEE Intensive (Class 11)
items.focusArea: JEE Adv, ISI Math + RMO base
items.description: Focus on JEE Advanced, ISI Math and RMO fundamentals.

items.title: Final Sprint (Class 12)
items.description: Final round of mock tests, concept clarity and exam polish.
